video.title: Beyblade: Metal Fury
video.synopsis: Gingka and his friends meet Yuki, who's searching for the connection between his blade, Mercury Anubis, and the mysterious Star Fragment.

episodes.synopsis: When a star falls from the sky, a young blader named Yuki is waiting for it -- and he immediately sets out to find Gingka. But this proves difficult.
episodes.title: Star Fragment

episodes.synopsis: Yuki tells the gang the story of a recently fallen star that's chosen certain bladers to be known as Legendary Bladers.
episodes.title: Legendary Bladers

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends are about to start their quest to find the eight Legendary Bladers, but a battle ensues when they run into Johannes.
episodes.title: The Monster Cat, Lynx

episodes.synopsis: While Gingka and the gang try to make friends, Benkei and Kyoya meet Ryuga at the top of a volcano, and Kyoya challenges Ryuga to a bey battle.
episodes.title: L-Drago Destructor

episodes.synopsis: After Ryuga defeats Kyoya, Gingka challenges him to a bey battle, but Ryuga quickly defeats him, too. Can anyone beat Ryuga's L-Drago Destructor?
episodes.title: Awaken, Anubius!

episodes.synopsis: When a volcano erupts, Gingka, Yuki and Kyoya try to change the course of the lava and save the village by using their beys.
episodes.title: Requirements of a Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Kenta travels to a remote desert town, where he competes against Ryuga in a tournament and then follows him on a difficult cross-country trek.
episodes.title: Kenta's Determination

episodes.synopsis: Johannes breaks into Beylin Temple and is confronted by Gingka and his friends, who engage the intruder in a bey battle.
episodes.title: The Crimson Flash

episodes.synopsis: At the Tag Team Championship, Yuki suffers a serious lack of confidence and almost gives up. With the support of his friends, can he rally?
episodes.title: The Greatest Tag-Team Tournament

episodes.synopsis: The final four teams are determined for the Tag Team Tournament. Dashan and the others learn that they're members of an ancient organization.
episodes.title: A New Roar!

episodes.synopsis: In the second round of the Tag Team tournament, Gingka and Yuki face Dashan and Chiyun in a mountaintop stadium.
episodes.title: Cosmic Tornado

episodes.synopsis: Ginka and Yuki travel to an ancient Bey Temple to battle Bao and Aguma of Beylin Fist in the final of the Toryumon Tag Team Tournament.
episodes.title: The God of Saturn, Kronos

episodes.synopsis: Bao and Aguma are followed into the wilderness by Johannes, who says he has news about the star fragment in Aguma's bey.
episodes.title: Showdown at the Tower of Babel!

episodes.synopsis: Aguma and Bao follow Johannes to meet Pluto, who wants Beylin Fist to join him in his dark quest for power.
episodes.title: The New Team Dungeon!

episodes.synopsis: Masamune and his friends witness an argument amongst the Garcias before their match in the Destroyer Dome. Is the family breaking apart?
episodes.title: Destroyer Dome

episodes.synopsis: Masamune and his new bey, Blitz Striker, battle against old and new foes in the Destroyer Dome, where a new blader is dominating the match.
episodes.title: The New Striker Is Complete!

episodes.synopsis: In the final of a battle royal in the Destroyer Dome, six bladers give it their all to see who will come out on top.
episodes.title: I am the Champion!

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends travel to Africa in search of a Legendary Blader, who they believe lives in a mysterious place called Mist Mountain.
episodes.title: The Maze of Mist Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Ryuto leads Gingka and his friends into a temple on Mist Mountain in search of a Star Fragment. But they're unaware that they're being followed.
episodes.title: The Lion's Pride

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the others reach a temple that they believe houses a star fragment, but they can't open a door that blocks their entrance.
episodes.title: The Guardian of the Temple, Dynamis

episodes.synopsis: Dynamis tells Gingka and the group about the ancient history of the star fragments. But he needs their help to stop the revival of Nemesis.
episodes.title: The Legend of Nemesis's Revival

episodes.synopsis: Dynamis explains to Johannes and his followers that the heavens will decide what will happen with the resurrection of Hades and Nemesis -- not them.
episodes.title: The Four Season Bladers

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends arrive at Beyster Island, where they've entered a tournament that's attracted a huge number of strong Bladers.
episodes.title: The Battle of Beyster Island

episodes.synopsis: As the battle of Beyster Island continues, Gingka catches up with Kenta, only to find that he's his next opponent in the tournament.
episodes.title: Two Big, Fierce Battles!

episodes.synopsis: The Beyster Island Tournament continues as an unseen Blader defeats contestant after contestant through a series of ambushes.
episodes.title: The Unseen Opponent

episodes.synopsis: Gingka asks Chris, the newest Legendary Blader, to join him in his fight against evil. But Chris says he'll join whoever pays him the most.
episodes.title: Orion's Whereabouts

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya is ambushed by a group of bladers in the mountains, who claim they thought he was a monster that's been terrorizing their village.
episodes.title: The Lion in the Wilderness

episodes.synopsis: When Tithi and Yu agree to a bey battle in the ruins, Tithi proves to be a strong opponent -- and Kyoya is sure that Tithi is a Legendary Blader.
episodes.title: The God of Venus, Quetzalcoatl

episodes.synopsis: When a strange energy alerts Gingka and his friends of impending danger, they head to Mexico to stop the revival of Nemesis before it's too late.
episodes.title: The God of Destruction's Revival!?

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends land in Mexico to try and stop Nemesis' Revival. But inside the temple, Rago, the Child of the Black Son, has already arrived.
episodes.title: The Child of Nemesis

episodes.synopsis: The battle to stop the revival of Nemesis continues as Kyoya battles Dynamis and Tithi takes on Aguma at a temple in Mexico.
episodes.title: Four Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Gingka defeats Chris in battle but convinces Chris that, as a Legendary Blader, he's part of a team and isn't alone anymore.
episodes.title: Come Together, Legendary Bladers!

episodes.synopsis: In a temple in Mexico, Rago battles all comers, including Ryuga, Gingka and his friends. But their beys have no effect on Rago's Diablo Nemesis.
episodes.title: Diablo Nemesis

episodes.synopsis: While the WBBA and all its members search for signs of Rago and Nemesis, Gingka and his friends train hard for the battle they know is ahead of them.
episodes.title: To the Final Battle Ground

episodes.synopsis: While flying toward the location of Nemesis in the Pacific Ocean, Gingka and his friends are forced to land on a deserted island.
episodes.title: The Lost Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends try to help Ryuga, who's been badly hurt in a battle with Rago, but it appears they're too late to save him.
episodes.title: The Missing Star of the Four Seasons

episodes.synopsis: Kenta and his newly evolved bey, Flash Sagittario, battle head to head with Rago and his bey, Diablo Nemesis.
episodes.title: Flash Sagittario

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the rest of the Four Season Legendary Bladers appear to complete Zeus's Barrier and seal Nemesis away for good.
episodes.title: Hades' Persistence

episodes.synopsis: Gingka has received the power of all his friends' beys, and he and Pegasus are in a head-to-head battle with Nemesis.
episodes.title: A Ray of Hope
